segment.source: UE-V Checklist
segment.target: UE-V Checklist

segment.source: Use this checklist to plan for preparing your computing environment for Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) deployment.
segment.target: Use this checklist to plan for preparing your computing environment for Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V) deployment.

segment.source: Task
segment.target: Task

segment.source: References
segment.target: References

segment.source: Review the Getting Started information about UE-V to gain a basic understanding of the product before you begin the deployment planning.
segment.target: Review the Getting Started information about UE-V to gain a basic understanding of the product before you begin the deployment planning.

segment.source: Getting Started With User Experience Virtualization 1.0
segment.target: Getting Started With User Experience Virtualization 1.0

segment.source: Prepare your environment for UE-V 1.0 deployment.
segment.target: Prepare your environment for UE-V 1.0 deployment.

segment.source: Preparing Your Environment for UE-V
segment.target: Preparing Your Environment for UE-V

segment.source: Plan which applications end users can synchronize with UE-V 1.0.
segment.target: Plan which applications end users can synchronize with UE-V 1.0.

segment.source: Planning Which Applications to Synchronize with UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Planning Which Applications to Synchronize with UE-V 1.0

segment.source: Custom settings templates only create custom settings location templates and then define a setting template catalog.
segment.target: Custom settings templates only create custom settings location templates and then define a setting template catalog.

segment.source: Deploying the Settings Template Catalog for UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Deploying the Settings Template Catalog for UE-V 1.0

segment.source: Create UE-V Settings Location Templates with the UE-V Generator
segment.target: Create UE-V Settings Location Templates with the UE-V Generator

segment.source: Decide which method of configuration (Group Policy, PowerShell, ESD-command line, or batch file) works best for your environment and plan how to configure UE-V 1.0.
segment.target: Decide which method of configuration (Group Policy, PowerShell, ESD-command line, or batch file) works best for your environment and plan how to configure UE-V 1.0.

segment.source: Planning for UE-V Configuration Methods
segment.target: Planning for UE-V Configuration Methods

segment.source: Deploy the network share to store settings packages.
segment.target: Deploy the network share to store settings packages.

segment.source: Deploying the Settings Storage Location for UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Deploying the Settings Storage Location for UE-V 1.0

segment.source: Custom settings templates only – deploy the features that are required to create and store applications other than the UE-V default applications.
segment.target: Custom settings templates only – deploy the features that are required to create and store applications other than the UE-V default applications.

segment.source: Deploying the Settings Template Catalog for UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Deploying the Settings Template Catalog for UE-V 1.0
